CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manage learning providers in Viva Learning Admin tab
CurrentVersion.description: ,Learning admins can manage the configured learning providers in Viva Learning admin tab. This feature will provide a detailed sync status as well as sync logs in case of a failed sync.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Manage learning providers in Viva Learning Admin tab
OldVersion.description: ,Learning admins can manage the configured learning providers in Viva Learning admin tab. This feature will provide a detailed sync status as well as sync logs in case of a failed sync.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Scope the administration of retention and retention label policies (U.S. government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations can leverage Administrative Units in Azure Active Directory to define who can configure and manage policies in Microsoft Purview. This update will include the ability to set a Records Management admin for a specific geography, department, or other unit, who can manage retention and retention label policies for their unit.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Scope the administration of retention and retention label policies (U.S. government clouds)
OldVersion.description: Organizations can leverage Administrative Units in Azure Active Directory to define who can configure and manage policies in Microsoft Purview. This update will include the ability to set a Records Management admin for a specific geography, department, or other unit, who can manage retention and retention label policies for their unit.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
OldVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Add learning to calendar on Viva Learning mobile app
CurrentVersion.description: Add to Calendar mobile feature will help learners on the Viva Learning mobile app add learning content to their calendars and block focused time for learning.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Add learning to calendar on Viva Learning mobile app
OldVersion.description: Add to Calendar mobile feature will help learners on the Viva Learning mobile app add learning content to their calendars and block focused time for learning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Immersive spaces in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Immersive spaces in Teams makes it easier for Teams users to transform their meetings into a 3D experience. With just one click, you can connect with your team in a pre-built immersive space right from the view menu in Teams meetings. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Launched. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Immersive spaces in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description: ,Immersive spaces in Teams makes it easier for Teams users to transform their meetings into a 3D experience. With just one click, you can connect with your team in a pre-built immersive space right from the view menu in Teams meetings. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked Launched. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

OldVersion.title: Information Protection - Changes in Sensitivity labels to control Microsoft Teams shared channels and private team discoverability
OldVersion.description: ,Information Protection - Controls while adding/editing Sensitivity labels to manage Microsoft Teams shared channels settings and private team discoverability.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search in Viva Connections Mobile for Android
CurrentVersion.description: Adding a search entry point and a new tailored experience for Viva connections users on mobile in Android.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Search in Viva Connections Mobile for Android
OldVersion.description: Adding a search entry point and a new tailored experience for Viva connections users on mobile in Android.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sort By Category
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows users to sort their emails by categories in inbox and other folders. It will help users stay focused and organized by allowing them to group related emails together directly in the message list. This update will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Sort By Category
OldVersion.description:
This feature allows
users to sort their emails by categories in inbox and other folders. It will
help users stay focused and organized by allowing them to group related emails
together directly in the message list. This update will be available in the new
Outlook for Windows and web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention for endpoints - Microsoft Endpoint DLP Support for Windows on ARM (ARM64)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, customers can extend Microsoft Endpoint Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policies and actions to endpoints running Windows on ARM (ARM64) which allows them to detect and protect sensitive data in files part of their digital ecosystem. This allows admins to introduce policy controls for scenarios such as when an information worker using a Windows endpoint powered by ARM64 chipset is accessing sensitive files and performing an exfiltration action such as copying to a USB, or copy to clipboard, notepad, etc.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced Incident Communication with DLP Email Templates
CurrentVersion.description:
,
You can now elevate your DLP incident management with the power of customizable email templates designed to send email messages to your stakeholders when an event is generated for DLP Policy match. With dynamic variables and tokens at your disposal, you can effortlessly create and maintain email templates, ensuring consistency and efficiency in your communications, along with a documented audit trail. You can utilize these email templates to: inform end users about incidents, their severity, or the analyst's recommendations; stay on top of remediation efforts by sending follow-up notifications to end users with due dates; keep analysts informed about incident updates and assignments; trigger escalation notifications to managers or other custom targets; notify approvers of pending items with ease; and many more similar scenarios.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced Incident Communication with DLP Email Templates
OldVersion.description:
,
You can now elevate your DLP incident management with the power of customizable email templates designed to send email messages to your stakeholders when an event is generated for DLP Policy match. With dynamic variables and tokens at your disposal, you can effortlessly create and maintain email templates, ensuring consistency and efficiency in your communications, along with a documented audit trail. You can utilize these email templates to: inform end users about incidents, their severity, or the analyst's recommendations; stay on top of remediation efforts by sending follow-up notifications to end users with due dates; keep analysts informed about incident updates and assignments; trigger escalation notifications to managers or other custom targets; notify approvers of pending items with ease; and many more similar scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Allowing participants to create Collaborative notes before and after meetings
CurrentVersion.description: This enhancement to Collaborative notes enables anyone invited to the meeting to create collaborative meeting notes and agendas both before and after the meeting. This means more collaboration, more efficiency, and an even more seamless teamwork experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Allowing participants to create Collaborative notes before and after meetings
OldVersion.description: This enhancement to Collaborative notes enables anyone invited to the meeting to create collaborative meeting notes and agendas both before and after the meeting. This means more collaboration, more efficiency, and an even more seamless teamwork experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add video to a playlist from an embedded video
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to add a video to a playlist directly from embedded videos across Microsoft 365 (SharePoint pages, Outlook, teams, Viva Engage, etc.) without having to open the video in Stream.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Schedule reports
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables users to schedule the export of reports on a recurring or on-demand basis. Additionally, users will be notified when the exported report or items are ready for use and download.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - View-only mode for Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection Policies and Labels
CurrentVersion.description: This capability allows the admin with view-only restricted permissions to view the Data Loss Prevention and Information Protection policy configuration details without editing the policies or label configurations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create more than one Connections experience in the same tenant
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability enables customers to create multiple distinct Connections experiences and corresponding home sites within the same tenant. Common scenarios include conglomerates or subsidiaries that require different Connections experiences for different users, each with its own dashboard, feed and resources.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections Administration in Microsoft Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Centralized IT administration of Viva Connections experiences along with home sites within the Microsoft Viva admin experience in Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: App type support in the Store for Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: Improved filters and badges in the SharePoint Store to support Viva Connections ACEs. Users can easily identify and find adaptive cards that work in Viva Connections Dashboard.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: App type support in the Store for Viva Connections
OldVersion.description: Improved filters and badges in the SharePoint Store to support Viva Connections ACEs. Users can easily identify and find adaptive cards that work in Viva Connections Dashboard.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Configure learning academies
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create and manage learning academies in the Viva Learning Admin tab.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Configure learning academies
OldVersion.description:
Admins can create and manage learning academies
in the Viva Learning Admin tab.
